name: Community Education and Training
description: Works with the community to raise awareness and educate people about health issues relevant to them. Learn how to talk to your child about sexual abuse, healthy childhood sexual development, and how to treat childhood sexual abuse.
fullDescription: Works with the community to raise awareness and educate people about health issues relevant to them. Learn how to talk to your child about sexual abuse, healthy childhood sexual development, and how to treat childhood sexual abuse.
whatTheyOffer: Works with the community to raise awareness and educate people about health issues relevant to them. Learn how to talk to your child about sexual abuse, healthy childhood sexual development, and how to treat childhood sexual abuse.
howToGetIt: Phone: (628) 206-8386 - During business hours: you can speak with a CASARC intake nurse. - After business hours: a CASARC nurse will return your call as soon as possible.
agency: Child and Adolescent Support, Advocacy & Resource Center (CASARC) SFGH
